text: John Waldron may refer to: *John Waldron (police officer) (1910–1975), Commissioner of the London Metropolitan Police from 1968 to 1972 *John C. Waldron (1900–1942), American torpedo squadron commander killed at the Battle of Midway *Jack Waldron (basketball) (John J. Waldron, died 1971), American brewery executive and president of the Boston Celtics from 1965 to 1967 and 1968 to 1970 *John Waldron (died 1579), merchant from Tiverton, Devon, England *John Waldron (lawyer), American lawyer based in Allentown, Pennsylvania
title: John Waldron
